duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide medical expertise and assist in oversight of the Noom Med program.
Participate actively in patient care, evaluation, and follow-ups.
Contribute to initiatives supportive of the clinician-patient relationship and to support clinician well-being.
Help develop and implement strategies to improve the quality of patient care.
Promote a culture of patient safety, prevention, and management of adverse outcomes.
Strengthen clinical protocol and policy development.
Contribute medical expertise to drive long-range strategic planning at Noom.
Participate in strategic initiatives and contribute to planning processes.

education_certification.credential: MD/DO with ABMS specialization in Internal Medicine or Family Medicine. Preferred qualifications include Obesity Medicine Board Certification or American Board of Lifestyle Medicine Certification.
